text: Sharon Jones & The Dap Kings were an American soul music band, comprised of Sharon Jones and ever dap king. Sharon Jones was the lead vocalist of the band. The band was formed in 1996 and disbanded in 2016. That was because Sharon Jones died on 18 November that year. The dap kings liked Mark Ronson and Amy Winehouse. They were signed to Daptone Records. title: Sharon Jones & the Dap-Kings
